snippet.title: Helldivers 2 - Official Gameplay Overview Trailer
snippet.description:
Helldivers 2 is a third-person sci-fi co-op shooter developed by Arrowhead Studios. Players will become a Helldiver in the name of exploring the galaxy and reclaiming planets that have fallen under enemy control back into the Super Earth coalition. Complete optional objectives on missions to reap rewards and powerful upgrades like weapons, armor, and more. Take a look at the latest trailer for an overview of Helldivers 2, launching on February 8, 2024 for PlayStation 5 (PS5) and PC.

#Helldivers #Gaming #IGN
